briefTitle: Project Q Pilot: Smoking Cessation for Light Smokers

armGroups.label: Placebo Comparator: Counseling and placebo drug intervention
interventionNames: Behavioral: Counseling and placebo drug intervention

armGroups.label: Active Comparator: Counseling and active drug intervention
interventionNames: Drug: Counseling and active drug intervention

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Completion of at Least 2 Study Visits
outcomeMeasures.description: Feasibility will be determined by number of participants that complete at least 2 study visits.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants Who Rated the Intervention Acceptable
outcomeMeasures.description: Acceptability will be determined by the number of patients rating the intervention usefulness in the experimental and control arms on a 7-point Likert scale, where 1=extremely useless and 7=extremely useful.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Validated Cessation
outcomeMeasures.description: Biochemically-validated cessation (absence of salivary cotinine) 1 week post-intervention.
